tasks.task: Caring for newborn and managing barn activities
subtasks: Caring for the baby (monitoring nap times, ensuring safety)
Supervising children in barn tasks (school work, listening for baby sounds)
Feeding and managing animal husbandry (hay delivery for cows and goats, checking for fresh hay needs)
Addressing temporary fencing issues (repairing electric net fence sections)
Observing and managing livestock health (checking ducks and chickens, addressing molting and egg-laying issues)

tasks.task: Managing daily chores and household activities
subtasks: Scheduling and timing hay delivery for optimal baby nap times
Coordinating outdoor activities with family (laying blankets, supervising children)
Adapting to weather conditions (handling wet ground and overcast play areas)
Caring for poultry (checking quail house, eggs)

tasks.task: Monitoring and managing garden and seedling cultivation
subtasks: Assessing garden progress and planning (garlic bed, seedling sorting)
Preparing grow lights and heating mats for seedlings
Promoting and affiliating with seed suppliers (Mary's Heirloom Seed)

tasks.task: Performing routine upkeep and animal maintenance
subtasks: Maintaining goat and cow facilities (checking bar and lean-to shelters)
Managing breeding cycles and retirement plans (goat heat cycles, Ruby the doe’s retirement)
Managing livestock numbers and adjusting herds (goat and cow headcounts)
Adjusting to post-move realities (reduced herd size, new property challenges)
Planning future garden and animal projects (new garden pest management, new bird hatching)
Engaging community and seeking support (Facebook group, wish list fulfillment)
